title: 29: Homes That Control | Preview Of EPP 430
itunes:title: Homes That Control | Preview Of EPP 430
description:
What started as a simple tapping on the windows, turns into a much larger and menacing spirit as it violently appears in front of a terrified child.

A young couple move into their new house, only to discover the darkness is about to tear them apart.

If you have a real ghost story or supernatural event to report, please write into our show or call 1-855-853-4802!
If you like the show, please help keep us on the air and support the show by becoming an EPP (Extra Podcast Person). We'll give you a BONUS episode every week as a "Thank You" for your support.
